  • SpriteAnimationStep

Class SpriteAnimationStep

A class defines controls when an sprite render which frame during the animation life cycle. Not like a normal animation, the sprite frames are discrete, we only render the frame while goto next one.

Hierarchy

  • AnimationStep
    • SpriteAnimationStep
